long_description: The ProRack Kayak carrier outfits your car for kayak transport. It's simple to install and also easy on the wallet. Rubber pads and cushions conform to boat shape, protecting the boat and offering a soft surface for the boat to rest on. Universal attachment hardware fits round bars, square bars, aero bars and most factory-installed racks. The ProRack Kayak carrier includes 4 mounts, 2 straps and 2 tie-down ropes.
short_description: The ProRack Kayak carrier outfits your car for kayak transport. It's simple to install and also easy on the wallet.
